description: Applies a machine learning model to a data cube of input features and predicts output values or classes for it. This process can be used as process in ``apply_neighborhood()`` to specify the patch size and overlap.

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: The data cube containing the input features.

parameters.name: model
parameters.description: A DL model that was trained with one of the DL training processes.

returns.description: The data cube with predicted value.
